title: BadImageFormatException in MSBuildTaskHost.exe
body:
I tried compile any c# project or vb.net project .. And All freeze

- MSBuildTaskHost Crash Loop .. to stopped i need open task administrator and kill proccess

I tried open MSBuildTaskHost.exe in Explorer and have BadImageFormatException 

- Visual Studio 2017
- Windows 10 Pro
- 64 bits

Any help?
